description: Identifies when a owner is was removed from a application or service principal in Azure. Author: Austin Songer @austinsonger. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Owner being removed may be performed by a system administrator.
Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment.
Owner removed from unfamiliar users should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
name: Azure Owner Removed From Application or Service Principal
query: properties.message:("Remove\ owner\ from\ service\ principal" OR "Remove\ owner\ from\ application")
